comments.body: Isn it easier to have a parameter in the constructor? Less code while subclassing `class WithAggregationKinesisStreamSuite extends KinesisStreamTests(aggregateTestData  = true)`
comments.diffHunk:
@@ -56,6 +56,8 @@ class KinesisStreamSuite extends KinesisFunSuite
   private var ssc: StreamingContext = null
   private var sc: SparkContext = null
 
+  protected val aggregateTestData: Boolean

@@ -56,6 +56,8 @@ class KinesisStreamSuite extends KinesisFunSuite
   private var ssc: StreamingContext = null
   private var sc: SparkContext = null
 
+  protected val aggregateTestData: Boolean
